name: note_app
description: Fullstack Notes Platform (Frontend + Backend) deployed together

scripts.install: cd Frontend && npm install --include=dev && cd ../Backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd Frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../Backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Frontend && npm run dev" "cd Backend && npm run dev"

author: Israel Assefa
